00028 #define MEMORY_GET_SINGLETON  0x0001
00029 #define MEMORY_GET_NEW        0x0002
00030 #define MEMORY_UNIT_TEST_MODE 0x0004
00031 #define MEMORY_NO_ERR_CLEAR   0x0008

00033 struct memory_access_obj;

00049

00051 DLL_SPEC void  memory_obj_suggest_leave_open(struct memory_access_obj *);
00052 DLL_SPEC void  memory_obj_suggest_close(struct memory_access_obj *);
00053
